abstract: Beverage group Lion Nathan has made a $7.7 billion Australian dollar ($5 billion) bid to acquire Coca-Cola Amatil, The Financial Times reported.
lead_paragraph: Beverage group Lion Nathan has made a $7.7 billion Australian dollar ($5 billion) bid to acquire Coca-Cola Amatil, The Financial Times reported.

headline.main: Lion Nathan Thirsty for Coca-Cola Amatil
